Poor soil quality: If the soil isgenous orgenous, it can lead to poor plant growth.
Watering issues: Overwatering or underwatering the plants can damage them.
Pests and diseases: Insects and plant diseases can harm the garden.
Weather conditions: Extreme temperatures or storms can damage the plants.
Lack of maintenance: Neglecting the garden can lead to overgrown weeds, dead plants, andgenous soil.
